welcome_message_body: Welcome to Amarillo! Get ready to experience the charm of the Panhandle, known for its cowboy culture, Route 66 history, and beautiful sunsets. We hope you enjoy exploring all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tradewind Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tradewind Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rick Husband Amarillo International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rick Husband Amarillo International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
